Headline: #26 South Shore Express and #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute near Ewing/100th
ShortDescription: 26 and 30 buses temp. rerouted NB: Ewing, 100th, Avenue L, 98th, and Ewing; SB: Ewing, 98th, Avenue L, and Ewing, due to police activity at Ewing/100th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#26 South Shore Express and #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Ewing/100th, due to police activity.

Northbound buses will operate via Ewing, 100th, Avenue L, 98th, and Ewing.

Southbound buses will operate via Ewing, 98th, Avenue L, and Ewing.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Diversey
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Diversey, Central Park, Fullerton, and Pulaski near Pulaski/Diversey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Diversey, Central Park, Fullerton, and Pulaski near Pulaski/Diversey.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following a mechanical problem on the train at Racine. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following a mechanical problem on the train at Racine.

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
